name: cat keychain amigurumi
notes:
crochet this cute cat keychain with the diy fluffies pattern and video.
this pattern is available for free in english and dutch.

when you make it with cotton sport weight yarn the size will be: 
5 cm/ 2 inch.
you can make it bigger by using thicker yarn and a larger crochet hook.

pattern:
https://www.mariskavos.nl/nl/gratis-kat-amigurumi-haakpatroon/

english video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bd68oacnlv8&t=18s

dutch (nederlands) video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aerpit7sqv8&t=5s
